Name: Violations Will Be Punished
About the game: This game makes fun of authoritarian systems, consumerism and mediocrity. You are a cog at a mega-corporation Space Mining in the 23rd century Solar System. Your existence is meaningless. If you don't behave they 'recycle' you. Then you defect to other factions... And betray them all to become the benevolent mastermind of the world. In turn-based strategy genre: - gather minerals and produce new units like in an RTS game. But it's turn-based, and it works - dozens of hours of content (6 factions, 8 campaigns, 100+ missions) - adjustable difficulty: can be enjoyed both by TBS veterans, RTS players, and casual players - create your own missions, units and factions in the in-built editors - skirmish mode with hotseat multiplayer Let's make the Solar System a better place!â„¢ After you've played for a while, please feel free to fill out this feedback form .
